subject: Decisions and Verdicts
Doping (Sports)
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors are seeking probation for a sports doctor’s assistant, whose arrest led to her employer’s conviction for bringing unapproved drugs into the United States to treat professional athletes.
snippet: Prosecutors are seeking probation for a sports doctor’s assistant, whose arrest led to her employer’s conviction for bringing unapproved drugs into the United States to treat professional athletes.
